title: Cherry clafoutis
description: Raymond Blanc shares his simple recipe for a classic clafoutis. Other stone fruits would also work well in this dish. Try peaches, plums or apricots.
ingredients: 450g/1lb ripe cherries, the best you can find, stones removed
3 tbsp caster sugar, plus extra for sprinkling
20g/¾oz unsalted butter, plus extra for greasing
3 tbsp caster sugar, plus extra for sprinkling
